solution_line_template: The total cost of buying bread and ham was ${cost_bread}+${cost_ham} = $<<{cost_bread}+{cost_ham}={total_cost_bread_ham}>>{total_cost_bread_ham}
Together with the cake, Tina paid ${total_cost_bread_ham}+${cost_cake} = $<<{total_cost_bread_ham}+{cost_cake}={total_cost_all_items}>>{total_cost_all_items} for the items

Since the total percentage for all the items is {total_percentage}%, the cost of ham and bread is ${total_cost_bread_ham}/${total_cost_all_items} * {total_percentage}% = <<{total_cost_bread_ham}/{total_cost_all_items}*{total_percentage}={percent_ham_bread}>>{percent_ham_bread}% of the total cost of items.
